about_the_game:
SPEED AND SPECTACLE

From streets and stadiums to deserts, mountains and a tropical paradise - Track design in EXOcars pays close attention to landscape, surface type, and terrain relief.

Featuring ramps, drifts, and natural obstacles, it makes you feel like an actual driver of a roaring buggy car, speeding through stunning scenery!

FEEL THE ROAD

EXOcars offers high graphical fidelity with rock-solid framerate.

In addition to that, the game is based on real car physics, ensuring a unique and immersive driving experience. Suspension dynamics and track surface interactions make every race feel fresh and thrilling.



MAKE YOUR FRIENDS BITE THE DUST

Each single-player race puts you against ghosts of real opponents matched to your skill level, allowing you to progress and become a top-notch pilot organically.

Real-time multiplayer modes let you compete with friends. Or find new ones in social lobbies!

Make use of car customization, hand gestures and an optional voice chat to show off your personality.

Whether you’re a casual driver or a seasoned champion, our matchmaking will tailor the experience to your needs.



READY TO RELEASE THE BRAKE?

Carving through the wilderness or tearing up the asphalt, EXOcars promises an unparalleled experience that will keep you coming back for more.

• Tournaments with real prizes
• New game modes
• Challenges and seasonal events
… we’re just getting started!

Get ready to rev your engine, feel the rush, and experience the future of racing like never before. Are you excited to take on the challenge?

SPEED AND SPECTACLE

From streets and stadiums to deserts, mountains and a tropical paradise - Track design in EXOcars pays close attention to landscape, surface type, and terrain relief.

Featuring ramps, drifts, and natural obstacles, it makes you feel like an actual driver of a roaring buggy car, speeding through stunning scenery!

EXOcars offers high graphical fidelity with rock-solid framerate.

In addition to that, the game is based on real car physics, ensuring a unique and immersive driving experience. Suspension dynamics and track surface interactions make every race feel fresh and thrilling.

name: EXOcars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct compatible sound card
  • VR Support: OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct compatible sound card
  • VR Support: OpenXR

short_description: Strap into EXOcars and compete against real players in single-player races and real-time multiplayer. Exciting driving feedback, advanced physics and graphics make for an unparalleled VR buggy racing experience.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese
